name: neu-attendance
description: Geolocation-verified attendance system for university classrooms.

scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.emulators: cp database.rules.json database.rules.prod.json && cp database.rules.test.json database.rules.json && firebase emulators:start; cp database.rules.prod.json database.rules.json
scripts.test:e2e:emulator: cp database.rules.json database.rules.backup.json && cp database.rules.test.json database.rules.json && firebase emulators:exec 'npx playwright test'; EXIT_CODE=$?; cp database.rules.backup.json database.rules.json; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.deploy: git push origin main && firebase deploy --only hosting --project neu-attendance
